tasks.task: Operating a Massey Ferguson Heston baling tractor
subtasks: Feeding hay into the bailer
Monitoring the windrow formation

subtasks: Highlighting the machine's capacity and performance

tasks.task: Addressing potential issues during operation
subtasks: Managing hay wads and plugging
Adjusting tractor position to prevent blockages

tasks.task: Collecting feedback and appreciation from viewers
subtasks: Acknowledging the positive reception of the baling machine
Sharing personal experiences with other models (7800, 8300)
Expressing gratitude to the audience for watching

Operate a Massey Ferguson Heston baling machine to create fully formed, dense bales.
So in this case, they’ve manually written a series of tasks based on the given transcript and have structured them into general MAINTASKs with subtasks.
Operate a hay baler to form a bale from a windrow.
Demonstrate the capability of the baler to handle heavy hay.
Manage operational issues during baling.
Interact with the audience to acknowledge their support.
MAINTASK: Operating a Massey Ferguson Heston baling tractor
subtasks: Feeding hay into the bailer
Monitoring the windrow to ensure proper formation
Adjusting tractor speed to manage hay flow and machine performance
Managing hay buildup under the tractor and shifting position to prevent blockages
Ensuring bales are formed correctly and achieving full capacity
